Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 76th, Greenwood, 75th and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
